title: Marketing Web Analytics Manager
content:
At NICE, we don’t limit our challenges. We challenge our limits. Constantly. We’re relentless. We’re ambitious. And we make an impact. Our NICErs bring their A game and spend each day turning it into an A+. And if you’re like us, we can offer you the kind of challenge that will light a fire within you.Responsibilities:
1. Manage the day-to-day operations of NICE web properties Google Analytics, Google Tag Manager, and BigQuery Database including publishing updates, maintenance, and ongoing optimization.2. Define, develop, and deliver new reports and dashboards for key website and campaign B2B metrics.3. Develop event and click tracking reporting to prove ROI of marketing campaigns, enable content measurement and optimize website engagement.4. Performing research as needed; reporting strategic and actionable recommendations to marketing teams.5. Regularly communicate website reporting results and provide expert insight to marketing leadership and colleagues to inform business decisions.6. Identify opportunities for optimization across website to drive conversions, as needed.7. Support website analytics integrations across various website locales.8. Help train marketing team to access, read, understand, embrace website reports and dashboards, and fully utilize Google Analytics' functionalities9. Work collaboratively with colleagues across marketing team and various business partners.10. Keep abreast of new tools and updates, and assess impact versus existing use cases. Be at the forefront of advocating use of new features where it makes sense, and providing training as needed.11. Recommend analytics best practices to marketing team to address business needs12. Maintain existing dashboards and proactively look for new ways of summarizing or visualizing data to uncover new insights13. Respond to requests for reports and insights on campaigns, webpages and landing pages 
Requirements & Skills:

3+ years' experience working directly with web analytics and tag management tools in a B2B environment
In-depth experience with Google Analytics or similar web analytics platform
Beginner to intermediate HTML, CSS, Javascript experience
Data visualization and reporting

NICE to have:


Experience with PowerBI, Tableau, or any other reporting/ data visualization tool
Google Analytics certified
Experience with Google Looker studio and BigQuery Database

Competencies:

Has keen eye for detail
Able to work independently and with a team. Open to feedback and has the agility to modify approach based on changing business needs.
Constantly looks for ways to improve work while maintaining quality and efficiency.\
Able to manage multiple requirements at the same time from different requestors
Able to translate customer requirements into reports and choose appropriate visualization tool
Exhibit a continuous learning attitiude and is perpetually interested in new tools, techniques, concepts that will improve work
Strong problem-solving, quantitative, and analytical abilities

 
About NICE 
NICE Ltd. (NASDAQ: NICE) software products are used by 25,000+ global businesses, including 85 of the Fortune 100 corporations, to deliver extraordinary customer experiences, fight financial crime and ensure public safety. Every day, NICE software manages more than 120 million customer interactions and monitors 3+ billion financial transactions. 
Known as an innovation powerhouse that excels in AI, cloud and digital, NICE is consistently recognized as the market leader in its domains, with over 8,500 employees across 30+ countries. 
NICE is proud to be an equal opportunity employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, national origin, age, sex, marital status, ancestry, neurotype, physical or mental disability, veteran status, gender identity, sexual orientation or any other category protected by law.

questions.label: Do you have any first-degree relatives (spouse, parent, child, sibling) that are currently employed by NICE or any of its subsidiaries?
Have you ever worked at NICE or any of it's subsidiaries?
Current Address (Full address, City, Region, Zip)
How did you hear about this position opening?

Were you referred to this position by any current NICE employee? 
If Yes, what is the name of the first person to refer you? If No, please type "N/A."
Are you amenable working in a hybrid setting (min of 2 days onsite weekly)?
Are you open to working night shifts?
Are you amenable to working in BGC, Taguig City?
